CANDIDATE 		Raphael Guinabert-Biehler
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		France – Villenave d’Ornon
QUALIFICATIONS
Masters Degree in Economics and Corporate Management - Petroleum & Engines Engineer + Energy Economist of the IFP – ENSPM 2007
Masters Degree with specialisation in Polymer Science – Chemical Engineer of the ECPM 2006
Classes preparatoires PCSI & PC: 2 years of intensive preparation for national competitive entrance examination to “Grandes Ecoles” such as ECPM 2001 – 2003
Baccalaureat Scientifique with distinction 2001
Languages
French – mother tongue
English – fluent
Spanish – fluent
German - basic
CAREER SUMMARY
2012 to date: Dorf Ketal Chemicals LLC

PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		France – Villenave d’Ornon
QUALIFICATIONS
Masters Degree in Economics and Corporate Management - Petroleum & Engines Engineer + Energy Economist of the IFP – ENSPM 2007
Masters Degree with specialisation in Polymer Science – Chemical Engineer of the ECPM 2006
Classes preparatoires PCSI & PC: 2 years of intensive preparation for national competitive entrance examination to “Grandes Ecoles” such as ECPM 2001 – 2003
Baccalaureat Scientifique with distinction 2001
Languages
French – mother tongue
English – fluent
Spanish – fluent
German - basic
CAREER SUMMARY
2012 to date: Dorf Ketal Chemicals LLC
Position: Business Development Manager EMEA, then Business Development Director
Top performer of the speciality catalysts, plastics and additives division
2011 LVMH Perfumes & Cosmetics
Position: Market Demand Coordinator
2010 Solutech (Engineering Company)
Position: Energy Business manager
2008 to 2009 Perenco Gabon (Oil exploration and production)
Position: Operational Cost Controller in expatriation
2007 – 2008 Gaselys (Gaz de France subsidiary)
Position: Gas Trader & Risk Manager within Altergaz (ENI subsidiary)
2005 to 2007 Air Liquide
Position: Marketing Development Project leader and Internal Auditor
Industrial Customers Department (GIS Paris) And Air Liquide Spain (ALE)
2004 L’Oreal
Position: Project Manager – International Innovative Raw Material Department
PROFESSIONAL SKILLS
Sales and New Business Development
Responsible in full autonomy of the EMEA entire region (reporting directly to the Company President and owner) working remotely and travelling extensively worldwide
Managing a network of 10 distributors in EMEA
Average 25% growth per year for the past 10 years with high margin levels / today portfolio valued at US$20M
Leading and training the Team (15 people) with advanced sales and business development courses
Prospecting and fast conversion expert (social networks and prospection techniques)
Counselor Salesperson (CSP) approved from Wilson Learning, Minneapolis USA (four step consultative selling process to build profitable and long-term customer relationships: Relating, Discovering, Advocating and Supporting).
Raw Materials Trading (import / export)
Market analysis (market surveys, decision tools creation)
Energy trading (buying & sales of energy)
Risk management (forex hedging, value at risk model)
Project development in France and outside
Marketing development project leader (plastics application, 30 people management)
Creation of a national and international office for an advisory company
Setting up of an operational cost control team in expatriation
Cost control / Audit
Responsible for the drawing and follow up of a $1BN budget in Gabon
Internal auditor in France and Spain (billing, active cycle, transfer prices, lapping)
COMMENT
A highly skilled and successful sales and new business development professional having developed for the past 10 years a solid and consistent record of double digit growth per year. He will be a 2022-2023 Executive MBA candidate.
Computer skills – Windows Office (Word, Excel, Visual Basic, PowerPoint, Access) SAP, Linux, Internet
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
